name: NarraFirma
description: NarraFirma webapp for Participatory Narrative Inquiry (PNI)

scripts.package-wp: cd distribution && rm -rf narrafirma/webapp/js && zip -qr narrafirma.zip narrafirma/* && cd ..
scripts.build-wp: npm run clean-wp && mkdir distribution/narrafirma && tsc && npm run build-wp:webapp && npm run build-wp:optimize:survey && npm run build-wp:optimize:admin && npm run build-wp:optimize:narrafirma && npm run package-wp && rm -rf distribution/narrafirma && echo Done building NarraFirma WordPress plugin
